ComicInfo.Title: You Could Be Next!!; A Day in the Life of Crazy Blue Rocket; The Case of the Missing Babe Part 1; Brunch
ComicInfo.Series: The Tick: Heroes of the City
ComicInfo.Summary:
You Could Be Next!!: Redeye terrorizes a truck driver and has menu problems at a truck stop.
A Day in the Life of Crazy Blue Rocket: CBR has imaginary adventures in his apartmant.
The Case of the Missing Babe Part 1: Paul Bunyan is despondant over the missing Babe and Paul the Samurai's big solution is to have Ashley dress up as her.
Brunch: The Tick tries to wrap his mind around the strange concept of a meal between meals.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 11:15:13. [CVDB122461] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 02:31:14. [Issue ID 265706]
ComicInfo.Writer: Bryant Paul Johnson,Clay Griffith,Marc Silvia,Susan Griffith
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Garcia,Gabe Crate,Michael Avon Oeming,Sean Wang
